mapper.update: UPDATE pd_shop SET pd_number =#{pdNumber} WHERE pd_id=#{pdId}
mapper.select: select id, pd_id, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_jprice, sp_Company, sp_Specifications, sp_color, sk_number, pd_number, pd_jiner, kc_jiner, wid, slchaer from projects.pd_shop limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into projects.pd_shop(id, pd_id, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_jprice, sp_Company, sp_Specifications, sp_color, sk_number, pd_number, pd_jiner, kc_jiner, wid, slchaer) values (#{id}, #{pdId}, #{spShopid}, #{spName}, #{spJprice}, #{spCompany}, #{spSpecifications}, #{spColor}, #{skNumber}, #{pdNumber}, #{pdJiner}, #{kcJiner}, #{wid}, #{slchaer})

insert into projects.pd_shop(id, pd_id, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_jprice, sp_Company, sp_Specifications, sp_color, sk_number, pd_number, pd_jiner, kc_jiner, wid, slchaer) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.pdId}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.skNumber}, #{entity.pdNumber}, #{entity.pdJiner}, #{entity.kcJiner}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.slchaer})

insert into projects.pd_shop(id, pd_id, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_jprice, sp_Company, sp_Specifications, sp_color, sk_number, pd_number, pd_jiner, kc_jiner, wid, slchaer) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.pdId}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.skNumber}, #{entity.pdNumber}, #{entity.pdJiner}, #{entity.kcJiner}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.slchaer})
on duplicate key update id = values(id) , pd_id = values(pd_id) , sp_shopid = values(sp_shopid) , sp_name = values(sp_name) , sp_jprice = values(sp_jprice) , sp_Company = values(sp_Company) , sp_Specifications = values(sp_Specifications) , sp_color = values(sp_color) , sk_number = values(sk_number) , pd_number = values(pd_number) , pd_jiner = values(pd_jiner) , kc_jiner = values(kc_jiner) , wid = values(wid) , slchaer = values(slchaer)
